properties.name: cxf.jaxrs.classes-scan
properties.description: Configures Apache CXF to scan for JAX-RS annotated classes.

properties.name: cxf.jaxrs.classes-scan-packages
properties.description: Configures the package(s) to be scanned by Apache CXF for classes containing JAX-RS annotations.

properties.name: rest.api.contact
properties.description: Specifies the contact responsible for maintaining the REST API.

properties.name: rest.api.version
properties.description: Specifies the version of the REST API.
